Params: {3: 'Brushing away the memory fragments, you and Aisling flee deeper into the mines.'}
{3: 'Abruptly, you freeze as a cold, foreign pressure floods your skull. The consciousness attack is back. This time, its target is no longer your Mind Beacon.'}
{3: 'It feels like ice water down your spine, a subtle burn spreading from your nerve endings, creeping up to cloud your vision.'}
{3: 'Something is being woven into existence around you.'}
{3: 'Before you can move, the path ahead transforms into a sheer cliff.'}
{3: 'You pull back your outstretched foot, certain that a tunnel should be there.'}
{3: 'Yet the precipice is undeniably real. As you start to doubt your own memory and reach for a pebble to test the edge, the girl panics, clutching your clothes.'}
{3: 'A violent tremor cuts you off. The beam of your light device shudders, yet you fail to locate the source of the explosion.'}
{1: "Could that be coming from Liv's position?!", 3: '70'}
{3: "Could that be coming from Liv's position?!"}
{3: 'Alert, you draw your gun and scan in all directions, only to find nothing unusual.'}
{3: "A voice, faint but undeniably Liv's, echoes from the tunnel on the right."}
{2: '(Abandon the path ahead and turn right)', 3: '62', 4: "(Ignore the voice and toss a stone to test what's ahead)", 5: '84'}
{3: "You decisively abandon the path ahead, take the child's hand, and turn toward the tunnel on the right."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Darkness swallows the passage ahead. You manage only two steps before a Hetero-Creature erupts from the shadows behind the rocks.'}
{3: 'The shot echoes off the stone, the creature dissolving into nothing.'}
{3: 'Someone, or something, is weaving illusions to control you, to guide your steps.'}
{3: 'You fall back to the previous tunnel. The illusion holds firm; the cliff still looms.'}
{2: "(Toss a stone to test what's ahead)", 3: '85'}
{3: "You just spoke with Liv over comms. She couldn't possibly be in the right tunnel."}
{3: 'You pick up a stone from the ground and toss it forward.'}
{3: 'It vanishes as if swallowed once it reaches the edge, yet you hear the unmistakable clack of it hitting solid ground.'}
{3: "It's an illusion caused by interference with your visual nerves."}
{3: 'But woven by whom, and for what purpose?'}
{3: 'Your boot steps onto the edge of the supposed cliff and, unsurprisingly, meets solid ground beneath.'}
{3: "Her voice echoes from all directions, and when reality snaps back into place, you're standing on the brink of a cliff again."}
{3: 'After confirming your Mind Beacon is stable, you stride forward without hesitation—'}
{3: 'And in the next second, you are standing in a sun-drenched conservation area.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conservation Area Supervisor', 3: "Huh? You're back so soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conservation Area Supervisor', 3: 'Melinoe went looking for you. Did you run into her—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The bullet smacks into the wall behind the supervisor. A spiderweb of cracks erupts, and the entire facade begins to peel away.'}
{3: 'The illusion shatters. You are still in the mine tunnel, as you knew you would be.'}
{2: 'The attack only works on the visual nerves...', 3: '134'}
{3: 'It seems the "illusion" can only interfere with your visual nerves, not a true mental trap.'}
{3: 'Without further deliberation, you check the terminal map, scoop up the girl, and hoist her onto your back.'}
{3: "You lock the screen to Liv's communication channel and point to the large green icon."}
{2: "Press this and it'll start the call.", 3: '144'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aisling', 3: "...Press this and it'll start the call.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'When someone answers on the other end, call for me.', 3: '149'}
{2: 'Aisling', 3: 'When someone answers on the other end, call...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She presses the communication button. A dozen, two dozen dial tones pulse into the silence, each one a fading hope before the call predictably fails.'}
{2: "Keep pressing it. No matter what happens, don't stop.", 3: '155'}
{3: "The little girl falls silent, the only sound the relentless busy signal at your back. She's following your instructions perfectly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aisling', 3: 'Will we... ever get out of here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We will.', 3: '163', 4: "We will. I'm sure of it.", 5: '163'}
{3: 'With your supplies rechecked, you press on, one hand skimming the rough rock of the right wall.'}
{3: "You navigate by the mental map drawn when you first entered the mine with Liv. According to it, a right turn at the second fork will lead to the Rodent squad's secondary safe zone."}
{3: 'Your landmark is an abandoned crane—a distinct silhouette that serves as an ideal meeting point in these labyrinthine tunnels.'}
{3: 'Everything around you peels away like faded wallpaper, as various scenes flicker into being like rapidly changing stage sets from Golden Age films.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, there's a cliff ahead! You can't go any further.", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, the transport craft is going to crash!', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '【kuroname】... Honey, will you be home for dinner tonight?', 4: '18'}
{3: 'The moment your foot touches down, both her voice and the world around you shatter like glass.'}
{3: 'The little girl on your back suddenly clutches your clothes, her grip tight with fear.'}
{3: 'The Punishing concentration spikes abruptly, and your monitor flashes a warning red.'}
{3: "The Hetero-Creature's howl of pain is an unfortunate proof: this is no illusion."}
{3: 'Hearing the creature so close, the girl whimpers quietly.'}
{3: 'As your gun barrel grows warm from continuous fire, several more Hetero-Creatures burst from a narrow passage on the other side.'}
{3: 'You dodge the attack from behind, but fail to evade the Hetero-Creature lunging from the side—'}
{3: 'You repel the monsters ahead, but fail to dodge the attack from behind—'}
{3: "The Hetero-Creature's claws tear through your military boot."}
{3: 'Ammo is scarce. Every shot must count. The recent wave of Hetero-Creatures was manageable, but your reserves are dwindling.'}
{3: 'As you sprint for the planned route, the busy signal echoing behind you turns to white noise... Did the call finally get through?'}
{3: 'Only a static hiss answers; no voice breaks through.'}
{3: 'You fire again, the shot count ticking down in your mind as you slam in a fresh magazine.'}
{3: 'The empty one hits the ground with a sharp clatter. No time for words—you rush forward, evading the creatures on your heels.'}
{2: '(Take the left path)', 3: '300', 4: '(Take the right path)', 5: '305'}
{3: 'The left path is shrouded in darkness, your light barely illuminating the ground beneath your feet.'}
{3: 'The right path is rugged and uneven, littered with stones and soil dislodged by recent tremors.'}
{3: "Bodies of dead Hetero-Creatures lie at the entrance, and the rest seem unwilling to follow, likely deterred by your weapon and their kin's fate."}
{3: 'A soft sniffle draws your gaze down. Aisling points at your calf, where the untreated wound weeps a slow trail of crimson.'}
{3: 'As you move to tear a strip from your clothes to bandage it, your eyes lock onto the terminal. The screen still reads: "In Call."'}
{2: 'The call... how is it still connected?', 3: '337'}
{3: "Liv's deliberately hushed voice comes through from the other end."}
{3: 'She repeats these words, as if terrified of omitting any potentially life-saving detail.'}
{3: "You're just reaching for your emergency kit when the world swims before your eyes. In the distorted haze, shapes move: Hetero-Creatures, slipping from the mouth of a side tunnel."}

{3: 'You and Aisling hold your breath, pressing into the rough stone of the tunnel wall. All lights have been killed, plunging you into protective darkness. Ammunition is scarce; for now, avoidance is your only strategy.'}
{2: "I'm not sure if it's the person behind all this.", 3: '368'}
{3: "The Hetero-Creature at the tunnel junction twitches, a grotesque spasm. You can't tell if it's real or a trick of your frayed nerves..."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The gunshot is a dull thunderclap. The creature shrieks, lurching upright—'}
{3: "You seize the stunned girl's hand and plunge deeper into the suffocating dark."}
{1: '1', 3: 'They are toying with you. Hetero-Creatures keep materializing from the shadows where you least expect them.'}
{3: 'Some are just illusions; others are lethally real.'}
{3: 'You rely on the Punishing detector to tell the difference, but the fatigue of endless combat is a tide washing through your skull, eroding your focus.'}
{3: 'The tunnels are a labyrinth. You navigate by the crude map, all sense of time lost.'}
{3: 'After loading your third magazine, you do a mental count of your remaining rounds. As you approach the next junction, the sounds of combat freeze you in your tracks.'}
{3: 'Is it another cruel illusion, or a fragment of reality?'}
{1: '1', 3: "You round the corner. A Hetero-Creature screeches and collapses. Beyond it, a figure struggles to steady her weapon. It's Liv?!"}
{3: 'She is slumped against the wall, covered in wounds. The simple act of lifting her arm seems to require tremendous effort.'}
{3: 'She clearly notices the two people approaching as well.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank goodness, I finally found you... Ugh!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As vital fluid continues to leak from her wounds, she lets out a pained groan.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant... could you give me a hand? My legs... I can't quite stand up by myself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant? What's wrong...? It's me, I'm Liv...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Not even bothering to say her name, you turn to leave—'}
{3: 'Just as you round the corner, a familiar figure approaches, firmly gripping your shoulder and guiding you in a different direction.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant... that one isn't real. I'm the real Liv.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv furrows her brow, her face etched with worry and tension.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Something's... not right here. It feels like an interference, something that can affect the human brain and a Construct's M.I.N.D.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I\'ve been seeing a lot of "illusions"... of you, and of others too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm not sure if it's the minerals in this area, or something else entirely...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Let's avoid this area for now... Follow me.", 4: '1'}
